Finding Sources with the UCLA Library

Created by renee-romero, shannon-roux, taylor-harper, kian-ravaei

Affiliated with UCLA?

If you are affiliated with UCLA and would like to receive certification of completion for this workshop, be sure to Log in and Enroll in WI+RE's Bruin Learn site before completing this workshop.

Not affiliated with UCLA?

No problem! All of our workshops and activities are open access and freely available to all! Enjoy the activities!
